author: potuz
content: <@206016661470314496> <@486477492434239488> I'm assuming these are the ELs ran by builders but this question goes for any EL dev. Blob txs have strong anti DOS measures like not allowing two from the same address and such. 1) do these constraints apply both to RPC as well as gossip? 2) if the answer above is yes, how open would you be to add a flag that relaxes the RPC point?

author: robocopsgonemad
content: now that we're all talking about gas-per-second as a throughput metric, has anyone considered how to create repeatable, client-agnostic tests?
